Articles.Content:
This is a simple 2k skybox I made for fun.

The galaxy is inspired by the one that appears in the main menu of Spore.

[http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/233051-spore-galaxy-skybox](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/233051-spore-galaxy-skybox)

I would appreciate feedback

Thanks.
I think you need a licence. But other then that great job!

> 
> I think you need a licence. But other then that great job!

I will look into that. For now I just put public domain. Also, these aren't the textures from Spore, I made them myself.
